sentence: …SMUCKER. Mr. Speaker, I am pleased to congratulate and recognize  Goodhart Sons Inc. on their 90th anniversary. Goodhart Sons Inc. is a  steel fabricator and installer based in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. Their  history began in 1935 when Frank G. Goodhart purchased the two-man  sheet metal shop that he was once an apprentice at. In the 90 years  since Goodhart's…
